zcthreads Library version 1.3

Package zc.thread

This package provides standardized, efficient versions of utility classes commonly encountered in concurrent Java programming.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Barrier.Command Interface for functions to run at synchronization points.
Channel Interface for message passing conduit between two threads.
Lock Main interface for Semaphore, Mutex and CondVar.
RWLock A RWLock accepts any number of concurrent Readers when there is no Writer and permits only a single Writer when there is no Readers.
SharedQueue A fully synchronized object container aimed for inter-thread communication.
 

Class Summary
AbstractSharedQueue Base implementation for derived SharedQueue classes.
Barrier Barriers serve as synchronization points for a group of threads that must occasionally wait for each other.
Barrier.Rotator Rotates the array of result objects so that each thread gets the Object presented by the thread next to it.
BoundedSharedQueue A SharedQueue that have a maximum capacity.
CondVar Implements a simple "condition variable." The notion is that a thread awaits for some condition to become true.
FIFOSemaphore A semaphore where waiting thread are woke up in the order they came in - that is in FIFO order.
Future A Future represents the results of an asynchronous computation.
Latch A latch is a specialized CondVar that once set cannot be reset ever.
Mutex A reentrant mutual exclusion lock.
Port Implements an asynchronous message passing channel.
RWLockReaders A RWLock that gives priority to Readers.
RWLockWriters A RWLock that gives priority to Writers.
RWLockWriters.SNL Specific Notification Lock
Semaphore Implements the Dijkstra counting semaphore.
SwingWorker This is the 3rd version of SwingWorker (also known as SwingWorker 3), an abstract class that you subclass to perform GUI-related work in a dedicated thread.
SwingWorker.ThreadVar Class to maintain reference to current worker thread under separate synchronization control.
SynchronousChannel Implements a synchronous message passing channel.
TupleSpace  
UnboundedSharedQueue Deprecated. Conceptually an UnboundedSharedQueue should be, well, unbounded, but in real world an unbounded queue that grow continually will certainly leads to disasters.
 

Exception Summary
BrokenBarrierException Thrown by Barriers when their integrity has been compromized.
TimeoutException Thrown by synchronization classes that report timeouts via exceptions.
 

Package zc.thread Description

This package provides standardized, efficient versions of utility classes commonly encountered in concurrent Java programming. These classes include:

  • Special-purpose locks, barriers, semaphores and condition variables.
  • Queues and related collections designed for multi threaded use.
